author: Christopher Null
title: The Reality of Covid-19 Is Hitting Teens Especially Hard
description: The pandemic has been devastating for us adults, but its impact on teenagers is arguably far greater.
content: Just a few weeks ago, the conversation in my household revolved around one thing: Where my daughter was going to college. Shes a senior in high school, high-achieving, and very driven. We spent the fall slaving over college essays and applications, 11 in tota… [+5025 chars]
